name: Shardtooth E'ko
tooltip:
Shardtooth E'ko

In Winterspring, you will find large bears wit extremely thick hides. These Shardtooth bears gain much protection from what dey can withstand. If you wish ta gain the resistance against fire, bring me da E'ko you find from da Shardtooth.

Rememba, you must have the Cache of Mau'ari in your inventory if you want ta hunt for E'ko.

Requirements:
- Shardtooth E'ko x 3
